description: Astronomers have discovered that planets can survive without stars, drifting as rogue or hypervelocity worlds. Some are flung into space by black holes, while others are displaced by gas giants. On some of these rogue worlds, the idea goes, there might be oceans beneath icy crusts, where life, at least life at a microbe level, could exist.
title: Could a Planet Exist Without a Host Star? Astronomers Say Rogue Worlds May Roam Freely

description: New research challenges the idea that 55 Cancri e, once dubbed a “diamond planet”, is rich in carbon. Re-analysing telescope data, scientists concluded that the host star has a lot more oxygen than originally believed, making the possibility that its planet formed with a carbon-dominant atmosphere less likely.
title: Diamond 'Super-Earth' May Not Be Quite as Precious as Once Thought, Study Finds

description: NASA’s Webb Telescope imaged the Lobster Nebula (NGC 6357), 5,500 light-years away. Its young star cluster, Pismis 24, contains giant stars carving glowing gas pillars. Pismis 24-1, once thought to be one supermassive star, is a triple system with stars up to 74 times the Sun’s mass.
title: NASA's James Webb Space Telescope Captures Lobster Nebula’s Towering Spires and Massive Stars

description: The Tecno Pova Slim 5G is the newest addition to the exclusive ultra-slim smartphone space. Priced at Rs. 19,999 in India, it is exclusively available in an 8GB RAM + 128GB storage configuration. The crucial question is whether any hidden compromises in build quality, performance, or software are significant enough to make the handset more appealing to marketing departments than to the average user. Find out in our Tecno Pova Slim 5G review.
title: Tecno Pova Slim 5G Review: All-Day Battery, But One Major Catch

description: Exoplanets are planets orbiting stars outside our solar system, hidden by stellar glare and detected indirectly. Astronomers identify them by tracking star wobbles or dips in brightness during planetary transits. NASA’s Kepler mission revealed thousands, with TESS now expanding the search. These discoveries confirm that planetary systems are abundant throughout the Milky Way.
title: Exoplanets Explained: How Astronomers Find Worlds Orbiting Stars Beyond the Sun

description: Scientists at Brookhaven’s RHIC have calibrated the sPHENIX detector, confirming it can track particle collisions with high precision. Now ready for full operations, sPHENIX will study quark-gluon plasma—the fleeting primordial matter from the Big Bang. By analyzing its “ashes,” physicists aim to reconstruct how the universe looked in its earliest microseconds.
title: sPHENIX Detector Clears Test to Study Quark-Gluon Plasma Which Formed After the Big Bang, Claims Study

description: Amazon Prime Video’s upcoming Hind-language series Do You Wanna Partner explores friendship, ambition, and entrepreneurship. Created by Mithun Gangopadhyay and Nishant Nayak, and produced under Dharmatic Entertainment, the show blends humor and social themes. Do You Wanna Partner stars Tamannaah Bhatia and Diana Penty in the lead roles.
title: Tamannaah Bhatia-Starrer Do You Wanna Partner to Release on OTT Platforms Soon: Everything You Need to Know

description: UY Scuti, a red hypergiant about 1,700 times the Sun’s radius, is the universe’s largest known star. Nearly 5 billion suns could fit inside its volume, but rivals like NML Cygni and Westerlund 1-26 challenge its claim to the crown. Astronomers stress that size estimates carry large uncertainties, leaving the title of biggest star still contested.
title: UY Scuti Reigns as the Universe’s Biggest Known Star, but Its Crown May Be at Risk

description: Apple is likely to unveil the iPhone 17 Air at its ‘Awe Dropping’ launch event on September 9. It is rumoured to be 5.5mm thick, making it the slimmest iPhone ever. The new model will succeed the iPhone 16 Plus. Here's what we expect from the new iPhone.
title: iPhone 17 Air Price, Thickness and Everything We Know About Apple's Slim Smartphone

description: iPhone 17 series will launch on Tuesday, at Apple's ‘Awe Dropping’ launch event on September 9. This year, the standard iPhone 17 is said to come with a larger 6.3-inch OLED display new chipset and enhanced RAM. It is expected to feature an aluminium frame. Here's a quick roundup of all the rumours we heard about iPhone 17 so far.
title: iPhone 17: Check Expected Price, Features, and Upgrades

description: Sinners is a supernatural horror movie that follows twin brothers returning to their hometown only to start fresh. However, they discover that evil is waiting to welcome them already. Sinners will make its digital debut on September 18. It will be available for streaming on JioHotstar.
title: Sinners OTT Release Date Revealed: Know Everything about This Michael B. Jordan-Starrer Film

description: Bitcoin whales offloaded 115,000 BTC worth $12.7 billion in the past month, the largest sell-off since 2022. While prices dipped below $108,000, experts from CoinSwitch and Pi42 say the move may create liquidity and long-term resilience. They argue that volatility is natural and could pave the way for healthier market growth.
title: Bitcoin’s Largest Whale Dump Since 2022: A Cause for Concern or Just Market Noise?

description: Coolie is a Rajinikanth-starrer Tamil action movie that follows the journey of a former minister embarking on a quest to investigate his friend’s murder. The movie revolves around Deva, played by Rajinikanth, a former coolie, who runs a boarding house in the city of Chennai. It streams on OTT platforms soon.
title: Coolie OTT Release Date Confirmed: Know When and Where to Watch the Rajinikanth-Starrer Online

description: The Japanese Anime Series Dragon Ball Z S3 is back with its part 2 conclusion of the Frieza Saga, created by Toei Animation. It is back with various iconic battles. The series will stream on Netflix on September 15, 2025. It will also reflect on Goku's legendary Super Saiyan transformation and the infamous five-minute countdown to Namek's destruction.
title: Dragon Ball Z Season 3 To Premiere on Netflix in September: All You Need to Know About This Popular Japanese Anime

description: Google’s next-generation Nest Cam Outdoor & Indoor security cameras have reportedly reached the shelves of a US-based retail store, along with the rumoured Nest Doorbell. To support their claim, a Reddit user has shared alleged images of the Google Nest devices, which reveal that they might support 2K video recording. This is in line with a recent report, which leaked the specifications of the upcoming security devices.
title: Google Nest Cam Outdoor and Indoor Models, Nest Doorbell With Gemini AI Spotted in a Retail Store

description: The Legion Go 2 handheld will get the Xbox full-screen experience next year, Lenovo has confirmed. The new handheld, which was unveiled at IFA Berlin, runs on Windows 11. The Xbox interface cuts back on Windows processes to deliver an experience optimised for handheld gaming.
title: Legion Legion Go 2 Will Get ROG Xbox Ally's New Full-Screen Xbox Interface Next Year

description: Nothing Ear 3 will launch globally on September 18, with an India release expected the same day. Teasers show an in-ear design with angular and semi-transparent stems engraved with the product name. The earbuds may come in multiple colours, including black, and could use new materials. Reports suggest major upgrades over the Ear 2, which offered 11.6mm drivers, AI microphones, 40dB ANC, up to 36 hours of battery life, and a Rs. 9,999 price tag.
title: Nothing Ear 3 Launch Date Announced; Design Partially Teased Ahead of Debut

description: Directed by Tushar Jalota, Param Sundari is a romantic comedy movie that stars Janhvi Kapoor and Sidharth Malhotra. The movie explores cross-cultural love dynamics and relationships.
title: Param Sundari OTT Release: When and Where to Watch Janhvi Kapoor-Starrer Online?

description: Skullcandy Ink’d ANC has been launched in India and the new in-ear TWS headset features 10mm drivers, ANC, and ENC powered by a quad-mic system for clearer calls. They support Bluetooth 5.4, multipoint connectivity, touch controls, and a low-latency mode. With an IPX4 rating for splash resistance, the Ink’d ANC is claimed to offer up to 43 hours of battery life, including the case, and up to two hours of playback from a 10-minute charge.
title: Skullcandy Ink’d ANC Launched in India With Up to 43 Hours of Total Battery Life: Price, Specifications

description: Xiaomi 15T series launch date has been set for the end of September, the company announced recently. The company has also teased the design of the rear camera module of the upcoming smartphone lineup. However, details regarding the India pricing and availability of the phone are still unknown. The announcement comes after the Xiaomi 15T was recently spotted testing on a benchmarking website, with a MediaTek Dimensity SoC.
title: Xiaomi 15T Series Launch Date Announced; to Debut With Leica-Tuned Rear Cameras

description: Apple’s annual hardware launch event, dubbed ‘Awe Dropping’, is set for September 9. One of the biggest announcements at the event is expected to be the iPhone 17 series. While rumours have all focused on iPhone 17 Air, the Pro models are also in line to receive major upgrades, from a new camera island to vapour chamber cooling. Here are the five biggest iPhone 17 Pro leaks ahead of the Apple event tomorrow.
title: 5 Biggest iPhone 17 Pro Leaks: 8X Zoom, Vapour Chamber Cooling, and More

description: Asus VivoBook S16 (2025), along with the VivoBook S14 (2025), can now be purchased by interested customers under Rs. 50,000 with bank discounts. The laptops are currently available in four colourways via the e-commerce platform Flipkart. While both laptops are identical in specifications, being powered by an octa-core Snapdragon X processor, the two differ in dimensions, screen size, and weight.
title: Asus VivoBook S16 (2025), VivoBook S14 (2025) Price in India Drops Under Rs. 50,000 via Flipkart

description: Poco X7 Pro 5G, Poco M7 5G, Poco M7 Plus 5G, and Poco F7 5G are confirmed to get discounts in the upcoming Flipkart Big Billion Days Sale 2025. Some of these handsets were launched earlier this year, while others were launched quite recently. Poco will announce the deals and pricing details of the devices on September 15.
title: Flipkart Big Billion Days Sale 2025: Poco X7 Pro 5G, Poco M7 5G and More to Get Discounts

description: Motorola's Edge 60 Pro on paper seems to have received several upgrades. There's a new display, a new processor, faster charging and a much bigger battery compared to the Edge 50 Pro. Its Edge 60 Pro’s main downgrades include slightly slower wired charging and a watered-down camera shooting experience.
title: Motorola Edge 60 Pro Review: Quite the Performer

description: Apple has scheduled its ‘Awe Dropping’ launch event for September 9, during which it is expected to unveil several new devices, including smartwatches and phones. Its latest Watch Series 11, Watch Ultra 3, and the Watch SE 3 are expected to be unveiled during the launch event, alongside the iPhone 17 series. This year, while the Watch Series 11 is expected to feature an iterative design upgrade, it is also anticipated to include a few added health features.
title: Apple Watch Series 11, Ultra 3, and SE 3: All Rumours and Leaks

description: Dish TV offers seven VZY smart TV models, ranging from 32-inch HD to 55-inch 4K QLED, priced between Rs. 12,000 and Rs. 45,000. A third-party manufacturer currently makes the TVs, which run on Google’s Android 14 platform. Dish TV plans to launch its own OS within 18–24 months. The smart TVs combine DTH and OTT content, providing live TV and streaming without separate subscriptions. Dish TV aims to increase non-DTH revenue to 25 percent by 2027.
title: Dish TV Launches VZY Smart TVs in India; Targets 25 Percent Non-DTH Revenue by 2027: Report

description: El Salvador acquired 21 Bitcoin for the fourth anniversary of its Bitcoin Law, raising reserves to 6,313 coins worth $700 million (approx. Rs. 6,000 crore). Despite IMF restrictions and limited Chivo wallet adoption, the government continues to make daily purchases, promotes Bitcoin education, and implements security measures, drawing criticism for prioritising government and corporate use over average citizens.
title: El Salvador Purchases 21 BTC to Commemorate Bitcoin Day Despite IMF Restrictions

description: Honor Play 10 has reportedly been launched with a MediaTek Helio G81 chipset, up to 4GB RAM and up to 128GB onboard storage. It is available in three distinct colour options with a 5,000mAh battery and support for 10W charging, according to a report. The Honor Play 10 also has an IP52 rating for dust and splash resistance.
title: Honor Play 10 Launched With MediaTek Helio G81 SoC, 5,000mAh Battery: Report

description: The iPhone 16e represents a notable change in Apple’s hardware approach. It is the first iPhone to use Apple’s proprietary C1 modem. As per a report, a recent comparison between it and the Qualcomm modem used in the standard iPhone 16 revealed that the latter resulted in better median download speeds in most markets. In some cases, the iPhone 16e and iPhone 16 outperformed each other on different metrics.
title: iPhone 16 Outperforms iPhone 16e With Apple’s C1 Modem in Median Download Speeds: Report

description: Moto Pad 60 Neo will launch in India this week, according to the company. It will feature an 11-inch 90Hz 2.5K display and will support the bundled Moto Pen. Powered by a MediaTek Dimensity 6300 SoC, it will offer 5G support, Smart Connect features, and quad Dolby Atmos speakers. The 6.9mm-thick, 490g tablet will include a 7,040mAh battery with 68W fast charging.
title: Moto Pad 60 Neo India Launch Date, Key Features and Flipkart Availability Announced

description: The crypto market stayed range-bound on Monday as Bitcoin traded at $111,000 (roughly Rs. 97.6 lakh) and Ethereum at $4,300 (roughly Rs. 3.8 lakh). Analysts highlighted strong accumulation across BTC and ETH, with whales adding to positions and exchange balances hitting lows. Altcoins, including Solana, XRP, Dogecoin, and Cardano, saw mixed moves as traders awaited Fed policy cues.
title: Bitcoin Holds Ground as Ethereum Finds Whale Support Amid Market Caution

description: PlayStation India and Tathvamasi Studios have shared the first look for Suri: The Seventh Note, the upcoming rhythm action platformer for the PS5. The game is inspired by acclaimed platformers like Hollow Knight and Celeste and takes a rhythm-based approach to platforming.
title: Indian Studio Tathvamasi Debuts First Look at Suri: The Seventh Note, a Rhythm-Based Platformer for PS5

description: Apple's 'Awe Dropping' launch event is set for September 9. While the brand hasn’t officially confirmed any product names, the iPhone 17 series is expected to take centre stage. All models may get 120Hz displays, including the base iPhone 17. The base models could come with upgraded RAM. All models could come with iOS 19 pre-installed. Here’s a look at the rumours emerged about the iPhone 17 series so far.
title: iPhone 17, iPhone 17 Air, iPhone 17 Pro and iPhone 17 Pro Max: All the Leaks and Rumours in One Place

description: WhatsApp users experienced a brief outage in India on Monday, which lasted just over an hour. Gadgets360 staff encountered persistent errors while trying to log in on a new device and were shown messages typically displayed during device linking failures. Users also reported the issue on a popular downtime tracking website, confirming that the service was temporarily inaccessible for many attempting to connect or switch devices.
title: WhatsApp Services Restored After Users Report Outage, Connection Issues

description: Bethesda has teased new content for Starfield on the game's two-year anniversary. The new content is supposedly titled "Terran Armada", as per a hidden message in a new post. Fans believe this could be the title of the game's second expansion.
title: Bethesda Teases New Content for Starfield on Game's 2-Year Anniversary, Could Be Second Story DLC

description: At IFA 2025, Dreame unveiled two advanced robotic vacuums. The Cyber X cleans multiple floors autonomously using its Bionic QuadTrack stair-climbing system, climbing stairs up to 25cm and covering five floors per session with 6,400mAh batteries. Its Smart 3DAdapt Vision System and triple braking protection ensure stable, safe navigation. The Cyber 10 Ultra features a grabbing arm and multi-tool system, reaching tight spaces, lifting objects up to 500g, and mapping homes in 3D with the TriSight Vision System. It will launch in early 2026.
title: Dreame Cyber X Unveiled at IFA 2025 as the World’s First Stair-Climbing Robot Vacuum Cleaner

description: Google has reportedly updated its Gemini Apps support page for users, showing them the exact number of AI prompts and images that they can generate with the help of the app. Earlier, the support page only said that the free users get “basic access”, while Google AI Pro users will get up to 20 times more access than basic, and the Google AI Ultra subscribers are offered up to 100 times more access. This alleged change, however, does not reflect on the company’s website in India.
title: Google Gemini AI Prompt Limits for Free, Google AI Pro, and Google AI Ultra Plans Revealed: Report

description: Apple has scheduled its ‘Awe Dropping’ launch event for Tuesday, September 9, during which the tech giant is set to unveil the upcoming iPhone 17 series. The lineup is said to include the standard iPhone 17 series, iPhone 17 Pro, iPhone 17 Pro Max, and iPhone 17 Air, which could replace the iPhone Plus models. Ahead of the anticipated launch event, the battery capacities of the phones have leaked online.
title: iPhone 17 Air, iPhone 17 Pro and Pro Max Battery Sizes Revealed in Last Minute Pre-Launch Leak

description: Samsung’s One UI 8 update rollout timeline has surfaced, offering a clearer picture of when older Galaxy devices can expect to receive the stable version. Samsung is expected to start rolling out Android 16-based One UI 8 with the Galaxy S25 series on September 18.  Last year's foldable smartphones, the Galaxy Tab S10 series and Galaxy Watch 6 series models, could also receive the update initially.
title: Samsung One UI 8 Rollout Schedule for Android 16-Based Update Leaked: Check Eligible Phones, Tablets, Watches

description: Live images of the Xiaomi 16 Pro Max have surfaced ahead of its anticipated September launch, indicating the presence of a secondary screen at the back. It is a popular feature that was last seen on the Mi 11 Ultra, but could make a comeback with the brand’s purported flagship handset. It appears to be integrated within the rectangular shaped rear camera unit. The Xiaomi 16 series is anticipated to launch this month in China.
title: Xiaomi 16 Pro Max Live Images With Secondary Screen Surface Online Ahead of Debut

description: Apple is expected to launch the AirPods Pro 3 in the second half of 2025, likely at the iPhone 17 event on September 9. The earbuds may feature a faster H3 chip, heart rate monitoring, a hearing test for early detection of auditory issues, and a temperature sensor for real-time health tracking. Analyst Ming-Chi Kuo also noted another update is planned for 2026 as Apple works on camera-equipped AirPods. Other reports suggest this technology may debut in 2027 with the AirPods Pro 4.
title: AirPods Pro 3 Set for Surprise Reveal at Apple's iPhone 17 Event This Tuesday

description: The Oppo F31 series will be launched in India on September 15 at 12pm IST, as per the company. The upcoming lineup is expected to comprise three models — Oppo F31 5G, Oppo F31 Pro 5G, and Oppo F31 Pro+ 5G. All three handsets could debut with several durability-linked features, including IP66 + IP68 + IP69 ratings for dust and water resistance.
title: Oppo F31 Series to Launch in India on September 15: Expected Price in India, Specifications

description: The Galaxy Tab S11 Series makes a statement before you even turn it on.
title: Samsung Galaxy Tab S11 Series: A New Chapter in Productivity, Creativity, and AI

description: With less than 48 hours to ago till Apple’s ‘Awe Dropping’ event, leaks about the upcoming iPhone 17 series are now surfacing rapidly. The latest rumor, originating from South Korea, suggests that the Pro models in the iPhone 17 lineup will boast up to 8X optical zoom..The iPhone 17 Pro and iPhone 17 Pro Max are also expected to benefit from improved thermal management, thanks to the incorporation of a new vapor chamber.
title: iPhone 17 Pro Leak Reveals Radical Camera Upgrade and Pro-Level Cooling
